description: At least 12 people are dead after a fire ripped through an apartment building in the Bronx. Four of the dead were children.
title: Scenes From Deadly Bronx Fire
title_page: Scenes From Deadly Bronx Fire - Video - NYTimes.com
text: At least 12 people are dead after a fire ripped through an apartment building in the Bronx. Four of the dead were children.
